meanings.definition: Not relating to the structure of a building or object.
meanings.sent1: The decorations on the walls are nonstructural.
meanings.sent2: The color of the curtains is nonstructural to the room's design.
meanings.sent3: The nonstructural paintings added a fun touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, a nonstructural element of joy.
meanings.sent5: The nonstructural details of the house made it feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Not forming an essential part of a system or organization.
meanings.sent1: The extra features on the app are nonstructural.
meanings.sent2: The font style used in the presentation is nonstructural to the content.
meanings.sent3: The nonstructural team-building activities boosted morale.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were like nonstructural pillars holding up the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The nonstructural elements of the event made it memorable and enjoyable.
